text: Leo Carbol (June 5, 1910 â€“ November 13, 1991) was a Canadian ice hockey defenceman who played a total of 6 games in the NHL for the Chicago Black Hawks. Carbol played most his ice hockey career with the St. Louis Flyers of the American Hockey Association and the American Hockey League with a combined 12 seasons. He also played 1 season for the Minneapolis Millers and 20 games for the Buffalo Majors of the AHA. He also played for the Detroit Olympics of the IHL. == Other websites == * Category:1910 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Ice hockey people from Ottawa Category:St. Louis Flyers players
title: Leo Carbol
